description: This agent gathers detailed information on a user-provided topic, validates the information, and formats it for social media use.

nodes.objective: Search for detailed information on the user-provided topic.
Summarize the information gathered from the web search.
Validate the summarized information by cross-referencing with reputable sources.
Format the validated information into a detailed, social media-ready post.
Provide a final review and polish of the formatted content before output.
